en: And when it is said to them,
they say, "And what is the Most Merciful?
they say, "And what is the Most Merciful?
Should we prostrate to that which you order us?"
And it increases them in aversion.

ar: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا
en: Blessed is He who has placed in the sky great stars

ar: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ خِلْفَةً
en: And it is He who has made the night and the day in succession
